
# R language sagarmuchulwar

## Adding two numbers

```{r}
a<-23;
b<-55;
```

## Display Result.
The sum of two numbers **'r a`** and **`r b`** is **`r c`**
```{r}
c<-a+b;
print(c);
```

# Features of iris Data
## Displaying head and tail of iris data.

```{r}
head(iris)
tail(iris)
```

## plot of iris data
```{r}
plot(iris)
```
